Module comp3111.examsystem
Package comp3111.examsystem

Class User

java.lang.Object
comp3111.examsystem.Account
comp3111.examsystem.User
Direct Known Subclasses:
Student, Teacher
public abstract class User extends Account
An abstract class representing a user, which extends the Account class.

    • User

      public User(String username, String password, String name, String gender, int age, String department)
      Constructs a new User object with the provided details.
      Parameters:
      username - The username for the user's account.
      password - The password for the user's account.
      name - The name of the user.
      gender - The gender of the user.
      age - The age of the user.
      department - The department associated with the user.

  • Method Details

    • update

      public User update(String username, String password, String name, String gender, int age, String department)
      Updates the details of a User.
      Parameters:
      username - The new username to set.
      password - The new password to set.
      name - The new name to set.
      gender - The new gender to set.
      age - The new age to set.
      department - The new department to set.
      Returns:
      This User instance after updating the details.

      public void setName(String name)
      Sets the name of the user. Throws an IllegalArgumentException if the name is empty.
      Parameters:

      Retrieves the age of the user.

    • setAge

      public void setAge(int age)
      Sets the age of the user. Throws an IllegalArgumentException if the age is negative.
      Parameters:
      age - The new age to set for the user.

    • getDepartment

      public String getDepartment()
      Retrieves the department associated with the user.
      Returns:
      The department of the user.

    • setDepartment

      public void setDepartment(String department)
      Sets the department associated with the user. Assumes that UI ensures a valid department is selected.
      Parameters:
      department - The new department to set for the user.
